kpi.name: M1001C157

kpi_info.title: RAB ACTIVE FAILURES DUE TO BTS FOR CS DATA CONV
kpi_info.use: The number of RAB active failures caused by BTS (for example, radio link setup or reconfiguration problem) for CS data conversational. UPDATED:When the RNC receives either an RANAP: RAB ASSIGNMENT REQUEST (release RAB) or an RANAP: IU RELEASE COMMAND message from the CN, and the RNC has sent an IU/RAB RELEASE REQUEST message to the CN before that, and the release is requested due to BTS failure, and the RAB type is CS data conversational. If the CN does not send a release message to the RNC within certain time period, the RAB is released anyway and this counter is updated. (See the section "Failure and abnormal release causes" for more details.)

kpi.kpi_alias: RAB ACTIVE FAILURES DUE TO BTS FOR CS DATA CONV
